about.title: Who are we?
about.paragraph1: Welcome to FREE TOUR CPH! We are a young and passionate agency, specialized in offering free walking tours in Copenhagen in Spanish and English. Our goal is to show you the best of the most charming city in Northern Europe through a close, authentic, and fun experience.
about.paragraph2: Our team is made up of guides who love what they do: walking, sharing stories, and connecting with people from around the world. We love walking through the historic center, sailing the canals like the old merchants, and revealing fun facts you won't find in typical guidebooks.
about.paragraph3: If you're looking for a Spanish or English tour in Copenhagen with anecdotes, must-see spots, and hidden corners — you're in the right place. Join us and discover the best of the Danish capital!

tour01.title: Grand Tour of Copenhagen
description: Join our Free Walking Tour and explore the best of Copenhagen with an experienced and passionate guide!
We’ll discover monuments, palaces, and hidden corners full of history, walking its streets like locals.
From the charming Nyhavn harbor and the famous Little Mermaid, to Amalienborg Palace and the vibrant Strøget street, we’ll show you the city like a true local.
Learn about the Vikings, the Danish monarchy, Scandinavian lifestyle, and the secrets that make Copenhagen one of the happiest capitals in the world.

warnings: Tours operate in the rain. We only cancel in case of severe storms.

tour02.title: Boat Ride + Walking Tour
description: This tour offers an intimate and exclusive experience, limited to only 7 people so you can enjoy every detail to the fullest.
We'll start by exploring the city's most iconic spots, discovering its everyday life and rich history.
Then, we'll hop on a boat to navigate through the charming canals and modern neighborhoods surrounded by water, giving you a relaxed and magical perspective that only a small group can enjoy.

warnings: Tours operate in the rain. We only cancel in case of severe storms.
details.price: €120 / 1000 DKK per boat (max. 7 people). Cash (DKK/EUR) or bank transfer.
